ResumeCTA.text1: The journey and results of solving business complexities

agency.title: Overwhelming Efficiency for Complex Fields
agency.subtitle: We build Lindy logic that survives in the field rather than flashy features. Beyond simple construction, we drastically reduce unnecessary fixed costs and time to return overwhelming results worthy of more than the development cost.

personal.title: Build Fast, Verify Relentlessly
personal.subtitle: I maximize development speed with AI and the latest tools,investing the saved time into system stability and completeness.Coexistence of 'Speed' and 'Quality' — this is my methodology.

agency.headline: We found the answer not at the desk,<line></line>but in the intense field.
agency.description: Gaps in the field that commercial tools cannot fill, unpredictable variables.Before writing code, we first deeply understood the operational workflow,and captured that rhythm in the program.

business.title: Business Optimization Design
business.description: It''s not just about implementing features. We design logic optimized for your business considering revenue structure and operational flow.

asset.title: Data Becoming Assets
asset.description: Not Excel files that vanish over time. We build core assets that accumulate to guide your business direction.

stability.title: Uncompromising Stability
stability.description: This is a field where money and people move. We prevent accidents with solid defense logic that allows zero margin for error.

personal.headline: A ''Solution Builder'' who reads business flows<line></line>and finds answers through technology
personal.description: I simplify processes through analysis that grasps the core of the business, and maximize development speed with AI technology.With solid execution that takes responsibility from planning to operation, I create tangible results of 'efficiency' and 'stability'.

business.title: Workflow Optimization
business.description: With analytical skills that reduced 3-month work to 1 month, I go beyond simple development to solve workflow bottlenecks.

asset.title: AI-Based Productivity
asset.description: I quickly implement features with AI tools, focusing the remaining time on quality verification.

stability.title: End-to-End Execution
stability.description: With solo development experience, I understand the entire process from planning to operation, delivering tangible reductions in operational costs.

Footer.address: Gwangju Metropolitan City, Republic of Korea
